item.title: ‘Is this a good tax strategy or a sham transaction?’ My mother wants to give me her home. I have a plan to avoid taxes.
item.description: “If my mother gives her personal residence to me, my understanding is that I also get her adjusted cost basis.”

item.title: My daughter’s boyfriend, a guest in my home, offered to powerwash part of my house — then demanded money
item.description: “The amount was about what I would have paid to get the whole house done, and not just one side.’

item.title: My husband used my money to renovate his house. Will I now get half of his property in a divorce?
item.description: “My name is not on the deed to that rental home, but we have been married 15 years.”

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
